message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 isn't quite where I need to be.  I'm willing to come down to $13,000.  This is a fair price considering the value you've placed on the product. Let's close this deal!
